Title: Relates to the elections of officers in the fire department in the village of Croton-on-Hudson in the county of Westchester
Summary: Authorizes the date of elections of officers in the fire department in the village of Croton-on-Hudson in the county of Westchester to vary from other village fire elections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the village law, in relation to certain elections for fire companies in Croton-on-Hudson
